body: Style nit: [For constants](https://google.github.io/styleguide/cppguide.html#Constant_Names), use names that are named with a leading "k" followed by mixed case, i.e. `kNullVal`, `kStringVal`, `kProtocolMajorVersion`, etc.
body_html: Style nit: For constants, use names that are named with a leading "k" followed by mixed case, i.e. kNullVal, kStringVal, kProtocolMajorVersion, etc.
body_text: Style nit: For constants, use names that are named with a leading "k" followed by mixed case, i.e. kNullVal, kStringVal, kProtocolMajorVersion, etc.
